project.name: GTE
project.description: The world's fastest decentralized trading venue, built on MegaETH.
project.longDescription: GTE is the world's fastest decentralized trading venue, built on MegaETH. Our solution is a fully vertically integrated product suite that delivers an optimal trading experience across each stage of a token's lifecycle.

features.title: Crankless Onchain CLOB
features.description: Providing CEX-level liquidity and price discovery for spot and perpetuals trading.

features.title: Classic AMM
features.description: For passive liquidity provisioning on long-tail assets.

features.title: Best-Price Aggregator
features.description: Across our AMM, CLOB, and the entire MegaETH ecosystem, ensuring GTE's traders are always getting the best price.

features.title: Permissionless Token Launcher
features.description: Utilizing a bonding curve to bootstrap liquidity into the GTE AMM.

features.title: Token Launchpad
features.description: For larger protocols seeking a takeoff venue for their TGE.

project.currentStatus: Takeoff, the GTE permissionless token launcher, the bonding curve, and the AMM are part of our initial testnet launch. CLOB and Perps coming soon.

steps.title: Token Distribution Model
steps.content:
Consider the following:

• 80% of each token's supply is set aside to be sold on the bonding curve
• The remaining 20% is reserved to see the token's AMM pool in case of it bonding
• Tokens bond once all of the 80% of supply on the bonding curve is sold out
• Once bonded, tokens will start trading on their respective AMM pool immediately. Long migration periods are a thing of the past.

steps.title: Trade Your Token
steps.content: Once your token is launched, you can start trading immediately on GTE's swap interface.

steps.title: Provide Liquidity
steps.content:
• When you provide liquidity to a pool, you earn fees from every trade executed within it
• The GTE AMM uses a constant-product model, meaning you'll deposit equal amounts of each token into the pool, maintaining a balanced 50/50 ratio
• In the future, more mature tokens will be traded in GTE's fully on-chain CLOB
